ingest.description-text:
An initial clue can give you
 the benford checker!

options.title: Options
options.text-excel: Here you can select an .xlsx file. In order for an Excel file to be evaluated, a worksheet and a column must first be selected. The file must not be larger than 10 Mb.
options.text-csv: Here you can select a .csv file. A comma or space can be used to separate numbers. The file must not be larger than 10 Mb.
options.text-box: Here you can enter numbers directly into a text field. A comma or space can be used to separate numbers.

error.to-large: The selected file cannot be larger than 10 Mb.
error.no-columns: No columns were found in this worksheet.
